description:
T1 - Rear garden strawberry tree reduce and reshape crown from 8 metres to 6 metres from ground level whilst maintaining healthy growth. Lack of light to surrounding area, Part of a regular maintenance program to maintain tree at a suitable size for its location.

T2 - Rear garden x1 apple reduce height 10 metres from ground level to 9 metres.  Reduce spread from 10 metres to 8 metres whilst maintaining healthy growth, Part of a regular maintenance program to maintain tree at a suitable size for its location.

G1 - Rear garden group of x2 pittosporum reduce height 12 metres from ground level down to 8 metres. Lack of light to surrounding area, Part of a regular maintenance program to maintain tree at a suitable size for its location.

T3- Rear garden x1 fig reduce height from 10 metres from ground level to 8 metres, reduce spread from 8 metres to 6 metres. Part of a regular maintenance program to maintain tree at a suitable size for its location, To enhance aesthetics of the tree.

T4 - Rear garden x1 climbing rose fell as close to ground level as possible. Outgrowing surrounding area, low amenity value.
